TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEditableCollectionView

summary.span: 定義 實作的方法和屬性，以提供集合編輯功能。

span.span: Defines methods and properties that a implements to provide editing capabilities to a collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合檢視的會實作介面，您可以直接變更基礎集合中，如果允許，所使用的方法和屬性會做的變更，公開 （expose)，無論何種集合類型。When a collection view implements the interface, you can directly change the underlying collection, if it allows changes to be made, by using the methods and properties that exposes, regardless of the collection's type. 型別， ，並類型所檢附[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]繼承自。The types , , and are the types that ship with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] that inherit from . 這些型別也會實作，因此您可以編輯使用其中一種類型的集合。These types also implement the , so you can edit a collection that uses one of those types. 尤其經常使用，因為屬性是。, in particular, is often used because the property is an . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用所定義的方法，將項目新增至集合。The following example shows how to add an item to a collection by using methods that are defined by . 此應用程式會顯示一份銷售的項目，並可讓使用者選擇加入、 編輯或移除項目。This application displays a list of items for sale and gives the user the option of adding, editing, or removing an item. 當使用者加入或編輯項目時，表單會提示使用者輸入新的項目。When the user adds or edits an item, a form prompts the user to enter a new item. 如果使用者提交表單時，就有一個項目致力於集合。If the user submits the form, the item is committed to the collection. 如果使用者取消表單，則會捨棄的項目。If the user cancels the form, the item is discarded. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[變更集合中的依使用 IEditableCollectionView 範例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#additem)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#additem)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object AddNew() cil managed

summary.span: 將新項目加入至集合中。

span.span: Adds a new item to the collection.

returns.span: 已加入至集合的新項目。

span.span: The new item that is added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫開始加入異動。Calling begins an add transaction. 您應該呼叫或結束加入異動。You should call or to end the add transaction. 新的項目永遠會出現在 [集合] 檢視中。A new item always appears in the collection view. 任何篩選、 排序或群組也就套用至檢視套用至新項目時呼叫。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when is called. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，會提示使用者加入新項目。The following example creates a that prompts the user to add a new item. 然後它會呼叫來建立新的物件以及設定的該物件。Then it calls to create a new object and sets the of the to that object. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[變更集合中的依使用 IEditableCollectionView 範例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#additem)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#additem)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanAddNew As Boolean
public: property bool CanAddNew { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示新項目是否可以加入至此集合。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a new item can be added to the collection.

value.span: 如果新項目可以加入集合，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if a new item can be added to the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以加入新的項目，如果下列條件成立：An can add a new item if the following are true: - 項目可以加入基礎集合。An item can be added to the underlying collection. 例如，如果集合是唯讀的是`false`。For example, if the collection is read-only, is `false`. - 可以建立物件的集合中的型別。The can create an object of the type that is in the collection. 例如，如果集合為型別，則必須要能夠建立型別的物件`T`。For example, if the collection is of type , the must be able to create an object of type `T`. ## Examples 下列範例會檢查項目是否可以加入至集合。The following example checks whether an item can be added to the collection. 如果是`false`，此範例會告知使用者，無法加入項目。If is `false`, the example tells the user that an item cannot be added. 否則，它會顯示一個表單，會提示使用者加入新項目。Otherwise, it shows a form that prompts the user to add a new item. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[變更集合中的依使用 IEditableCollectionView 範例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections) . [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#additem)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#additem)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanCancelEdit As Boolean
public: property bool CanCancelEdit { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示集合檢視是否可以捨棄暫止的變更，並還原已編輯物件的原始值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object.

value.span: 如果集合檢視可以捨棄暫止的變更，並還原已編輯物件的原始值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是`true`檢視是否支援目前已編輯的項目上的 「 暫止的變更 」 的概念。 is `true` if the view supports the notion of "pending changes" on the currently edited item. 例如，可能會傳回集合檢視`true`如果已編輯的項目實作，檢視是否具有它可用來向前復原的項目狀態的相關資訊或回復變更。For example, a collection view might return `true` if the edited item implements , or if the view has information about the item's state that it can use to roll back changes. 是`false`如果檢視無法還原物件的變更。 is `false` if the view cannot revert changes on an object. 在此情況下，呼叫造成結束編輯狀態，並提供邏輯，以還原已編輯的物件上變更檢視。In that case, call to cause the view to exit the edit state and provide logic to revert the changes on the object that was edited. ## Examples 下列範例會取得檢查之前呼叫，是否可以還原已編輯的項目原始值。The following example gets to check whether the original values of the edited item can be restored before it calls . 如果值無法還原，您必須提供額外的邏輯，若要這樣做。If the values cannot be restored, you must supply additional logic to do so. 此範例會呼叫時，如果可以還原值。If they can be, the values are restored when the example calls . 如需完整的範例，請參閱[變更集合中的依使用 IEditableCollectionView 範例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#canceledit)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#canceledit)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CancelEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 結束編輯異動，並在可能情況下還原項目的原始值。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction and, if possible, restores the original value to the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至`null`及造成集合檢視結束編輯狀態。 sets to `null` and causes the collection view to exit the edit state. 如果已`true`，也會還原已編輯物件的原始值。If is `true`, also restores the original values of the edited object. ## Examples 下列範例會取得檢查之前呼叫，是否可以還原已編輯的項目原始值。The following example gets to check whether the original values of the edited item can be restored before it calls . 如果值無法還原，您必須提供額外的邏輯，若要這樣做。If the values cannot be restored, you must supply additional logic to do so. 此範例會呼叫時，如果可以還原值。If they can be, the values are restored when the example calls . 如需完整的範例，請參閱[變更集合中的依使用 IEditableCollectionView 範例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#canceledit)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#canceledit)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CancelNew() cil managed

summary.span: 結束加入異動並捨棄暫止的新項目。

span.span: Ends the add transaction and discards the pending new item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會顯示一個表單，會提示使用者加入新項目。The following example displays a form that prompts the user to add a new item. 如果使用者提交表單時，此範例會呼叫將項目新增至集合。If the user submits the form, the example calls to add the item to the collection. 如果使用者取消表單，此範例會呼叫捨棄的項目。If the user cancels the form, the example calls to discard the item. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[變更集合中的依使用 IEditableCollectionView 範例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否可以從集合中移除某個項目。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether an item can be removed from the collection.

value.span: 如果可以從集合中移除某個項目，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if an item can be removed from the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是`false`如果基礎集合是唯讀的。 is `false` if the underlying collection is read-only. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫來檢查是否可以從集合中移除項目。The following example calls to check whether an item can be removed from the collection. 如果可以移除項目，此範例會提示使用者確認動作，然後呼叫如果使用者按下**是**。If an item can be removed, the example prompts the user to confirm the action and calls if the user clicks **Yes**. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[變更集合中的依使用 IEditableCollectionView 範例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CommitEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 結束編輯異動並儲存暫止的變更。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction and saves the pending changes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立一個表單，會提示使用者編輯現有的項目。The following example creates a form that prompts the user to edit an existing item. 如果使用者提交表單時，此範例會呼叫將變更儲存至集合。If the user submits the form, the example calls to save the changes to the collection. 如果使用者取消表單，此範例會呼叫捨棄所做的變更。If the user cancels the form, the example calls to discard the changes. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[變更集合中的依使用 IEditableCollectionView 範例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). summary.span: 結束加入異動並儲存暫止的新項目。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何篩選、 排序或群組也就套用至套用至新項目時呼叫。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the is applied to the new item when is called. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示一個表單，會提示使用者加入新項目。The following example displays a form that prompts the user to add a new item. 如果使用者提交表單時，此範例會呼叫將項目新增至集合。If the user submits the form, the example calls to add the item to the collection. 如果使用者取消表單，此範例會呼叫捨棄的項目。If the user cancels the form, the example calls to discard the item. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[變更集合中的依使用 IEditableCollectionView 範例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EditItem(object item) cil managed

span.span: The item to edit.

summary.span: 開始所指定項目的編輯異動。

span.span: Begins an edit transaction of the specified item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立一個表單，會提示使用者編輯現有的項目。The following example creates a form that prompts the user to edit an existing item. 如果使用者提交表單時，所做的變更將會認可至集合。If the user submits the form, the changes are committed to the collection. 如果使用者取消表單，則會捨棄這些變更。If the user cancels the form, the changes are discarded. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[變更集合中的依使用 IEditableCollectionView 範例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections) . remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由呼叫開始加入異動及呼叫結束加入異動或。You begin an add transaction by calling and end the add transaction by calling or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ComponentModel::NewItemPlaceholderPosition NewItemPlaceholderPosition { System::ComponentModel::NewItemPlaceholderPosition get(); void set(System::ComponentModel::NewItemPlaceholderPosition value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the new item placeholder in the collection view.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(object item) cil managed

span.span: The item to remove.

summary.span: 從集合中移除指定的項目。

span.span: Removes the specified item from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`item`不在集合中，不執行任何動作。If `item` is not in the collection, does nothing. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫來檢查是否可以從集合中移除項目。The following example calls to check whether an item can be removed from the collection. 如果可以移除項目，此範例會提示使用者確認動作，然後呼叫如果使用者按下**是**。If an item can be removed, the example prompts the user to confirm the action and calls if the user clicks **Yes**. 如需完整的範例，請參閱[變更集合中的依使用 IEditableCollectionView 範例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#RemoveItem](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#removeitem)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#RemoveItem](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#removeitem)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed

span.span: The position of the item to remove.

summary.span: 從集合中移除位於指定之位置的項目。

span.span: Removes the item at the specified position from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `index` 是相對於集合檢視，而不是集合。`index` is relative to the collection view, not the collection. 例如，如果集合有 10 個項目和檢視已如此會顯示 7 個項目，有效的值的`index`是從 0 到 6。For example, if the collection has 10 items and the view has a so that 7 items appear, the valid values of `index` are 0 through 6.

exception.span: 小於 0，或大於集合檢視中項目的數目。

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than the number of items in the collection view.
